thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-YNAP sees 2018 revenue growth in line with strategic plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-YNAP sees 2018 revenue growth in line with strategic plan
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Online luxury retailer Yoox Net-A-Porter (YNAP) says:
* 2017 ADJUSTED EBITDA 169.2 MILLION EUROS VERSUS THOMSON REUTERS ESTIMATE OF 169 MILLION EUROS
* 2017 ADJUSTED NET INCOME 51.2 MILLION EUROS * POSITIVE NET FINANCIAL POSITION AT 83.7 MILLION EUROS ON DEC. 31, 2017 VERSUS 104.7 MILLION END-2016
* GROUP TO INVEST 170-180 MILLION EUROS IN 2018
* EXPECTS TO ACHIEVE ORGANIC NET REVENUE GROWTH IN LINE WITH STRATEGIC PLAN, DELIVER IMPROVED ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN AT CONSTANT EXCHANGE RATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
